author: Trigger_
title: Good Set, But Only as Good as Shuff
review:
First, the positives: I love that the mould was broken with this Mixel having a long neck as a play feature. Onto negatives:

  • Continuing what I said above, the playability of the neck suffers from the use of stepped hinges – rather than the new joint plates or even clip/bar plates – for articulation.
  • Arms and legs are uneccesarily short (if you can call those legs! More like feet).
  • Arms are hinged.

Still better than Seismo.

author: Master_Wu
title: Fun to build!
review:
I'm not a fan of mixels but I really enjoyed building this thing!

Lunk has some excellent parts which can be used to build the model and play with, or in many of your own creations!

It isn't great for its play values, and it was a bit expensive, but I enjoyed building this and making many of my own creations with it!
